name: Mister Sandman
description:
Personnal project for the end of my Unity courses - made in 7 days

In this chilly game, as Mister Sandman, you'll have to get to sleep every village of the map.

Unity and development skills involved :

  • Unity Events
  • Event triggers
  • Cinemachine
  • Particles Systems and Particle Collision
  • UI
  • 2D Lights
  • Animated Tilemap
  • Scriptable Objects

To do :

  • Add sound effect
  • Add a mini map or directionnal indications

Special thanks to my sister for the great music you can hear in the menu and the game <3
